# DatastoreLocation

**Structure**

A type for specifying a custom location for your tips datastore.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DatastoreLocation
```

## Overview

For more information on datastore location, see [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/ConfigurationOption/datastoreLocation(_:)].

## Type Properties

- **applicationDefault**: The default location for persisting tips, which is generally your application’s support directory.

## Type Methods

- **groupContainer(identifier:)**: DatastoreLocation for persisting tips in a group container.
- **url(_:)**: Configuration option for persisting tips at a custom on-disk location.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
